attributes.additional_details:
I respectfully request that Minley Manor should not be sold by the Ministry of Defence but instead be adapted and maintained for the benefit of our Armed Services as a respite and convalescence location for the Families, Comrades, Loved Ones and Friends of my Brothers and Sisters In Arms who have died in service of their country.   It should also be available to those suffering from Post Traumatic Stress Disorder and their Families, Comrades, Loved ones and Friends.
The possibility that this tax-payer financed asset could be lost to the nation is totally unacceptable.
Lest we forget.
